extension.name: System - jSGCache
extension.author: George Penkov
extension.description:
Please enable this plugin in the Plug-in Manager before continuing. Before you can use this plugin you need to have the SG Cache service installed and activated.
Through the settings of this plugin you can manage how your Joomla interacts with SG Cache.

field.name: autoFlush
field.label: Automatic cache flushing
field.description: Cache is automatically flushed when any action is performed in the administration panel.

field.name: autoFlush-ThirdParty
field.label: Autoflush 3rd party plugins
field.description: Automatically flush SG Cache if changes are detected on supported 3rd party plugins.

field.name: autoFlush-ClientSide
field.label: Autoflush outside administration
field.description: Automatically flush SG Cache if changes are detected outside the administration area.

field.name: blacklist
field.label: URL blacklist
field.description: Enter all the urls you want to exclude from SuperCacher.
